alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued February 19 at 2:59AM EST until February 19 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches in the most persistent lake snows across the Tug Hill Plateau, and 3 to 6 inches for surrounding lower elevations. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will produce extensive blowing and drifting snow with near whiteout conditions at times. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. Greatest accumulations across the Tug Hill Plateau. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility with near whiteout conditions at times. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4398 7544 4414 7523 4432 7570 4416 7609 4401 7634 4386 7637 4383 7629 4363 7623 4358 7577 4375 7552 TIME Y22M02D19T1200Z-Y22M02D19T1800Z COORD...4374 7519 4384 7531 4384 7593 4367 7623 4350 7626 4345 7618 4343 7601 4348 7581 4345 7548 4355 7526 TIME Y22M02D19T1800Z-Y22M02D19T2300Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
